title.rendered: Tastebudz MAC Muffin Feminized cannabis seeds

content.rendered:
🫐 Why Tastebudz MAC Muffin Strain Feminized Seeds?

What is MAC Muffin strain?

The MAC Muffin strain by Tastebudz is a 100% Indica powerhouse delivering a deeply relaxing and flavour-packed experience. Born from the elite genetics of Alien Cookies x Starfighter x Blueberry Kush, this strain offers large yields, mould resistance, and rich blueberry tart flavours wrapped in earthy fruit undertones.

Ideal for collectors who seek both flavour and function, MAC Muffin promotes mental clarity and physical calm — perfect for creative focus, problem-solving, or just unwinding without couchlock.

📊 MAC Muffin Strain Quick Facts

Feature Details
🌱 Type 100% Indica
🔬 Genetics Alien Cookies x Starfighter x Blueberry Kush
🔥 THC 22%
🍇 Flavours Blueberry Tart, Earthy Fruit, Sweet Sugar-Coated Finish
💡 Indoor Yield 500–600g/m²
🌿 Outdoor Yield 1300–2000g/plant
⏳ Flowering 50–55 Days
📅 Harvest September
📏 Height 70cm (indoors), 130cm (outdoors)
🌬 Terpenes Beta Pinene, Caryophyllene, D-Limonene, Myrcene, Nerolidol & more

🛒 Also Available: Tastebudz MAC Muffin Auto

Love the genetics but prefer autoflowering convenience? Check out the MAC Muffin Auto, offering the same flavour profile and effects in a faster, easier format — ideal for compact spaces or beginner-friendly setups.

🎯 Why Collect MAC Muffin Strain Seeds?

  • Elite Lineage: Bred from top-tier strains for flavour and stability
  • Blueberry Dessert Terps: A sugar-coated, tart berry explosion
  • True Indica Effects: Deep body relaxation with a clear mind
  • Heavy Yields: Impressive harvests indoors and outdoors
  • Robust Genetics: Excellent resistance to mould and environmental stress

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About MAC Muffin Strain

1. What does MAC Muffin strain taste like?
MAC Muffin delivers a dessert-style flavour, with rich notes of blueberry tart, earthy fruit, and a sweet finish that lingers on the tongue.

2. Is MAC Muffin strain good for beginners?
Yes! With its stable photoperiod genetics, mould resistance, and manageable height, it’s a great choice for novice collectors or those new to indica strains.

3. What kind of effects does MAC Muffin produce?
Expect full-body relaxation without sedation. MAC Muffin is ideal for focused creativity, calm productivity, or winding down peacefully.

4. What’s the difference between MAC Muffin and MAC Muffin Auto?
The photoperiod version gives full control over flowering cycles and bigger yields, while the auto version flowers automatically and is better for faster results.

📦 Shipping & Delivery Info

✅ Free UK shipping on orders over £50
✅ Fast, discreet worldwide delivery — including the USA & Europe
✅ Secure packaging and tracked options available

🛍 Add MAC Muffin to Your Collection

If you’re looking for a true Indica with dessert-level flavour and generous yields, the MAC Muffin strain is a must-have. Whether you’re drawn to its rich blueberry profile or its calm, clear-headed effects, this strain stands out in any collection.

🛒 Order now from Tastebudz Syndicate – Feminized seeds available while stocks last.

🔗 Want More Flavour?

Explore more heavy-hitting strains in our Tastebudz Classic Strains Collection, or build your own mix with Pick n Mix Cannabis Seeds – perfect for variety lovers.

⚠️ Legal Notice

All Tastebudz Syndicate seeds are sold as collectible adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license. Please research your local laws before purchase.
